text: [Music]
the field of genetics is Rich with
Discovery and Innovation mapping the
human genome conducting genetic testing
and identifying new vaccines are just a
few ways this field has revolutionized
the way medicine is practiced many of
these developments were made right here
at Stanford every day our researchers
are advancing Frontiers and biom
medicine and the biological sciences the
Stanford genetics and genomics
certificate program was created to help
professionals understand the latest
trends and technology used in
personalized medicine and genetics
research it's offered entirely online we
are able to reach a community of
Learners and enable them to apply their
education immediately in their own work
is through this Cutting Edge research
and approach that the field will
continue to advance and the expertise of
Stanford faculty and top industry
leaders can be utilized for greater
lasting impact from technology leaders
to Medical sales representatives to
anyone interested in biology and human
health this program will help you
understand the big picture behind
genetics and give your career a
Competitive Edge within a rapidly
changing
[Music]
industry
